definition[0]: to work hard to achieve or oppose something, especially in a situation where you are losing
example[0]: United fought back and scored a last-minute goal.
example[1]: She was fighting back against the cancer.
definition[1]: to use violence or arguments against someone who has attacked you or argued with you
definition[2]: to try hard not to have or show a feeling
example[3]: She looked away, fighting back her tears.
example[4]: He fought back the impulse to slap her.
